wikipedia_page.main: Amy-Eloise Markovc (née Neale; born 5 August 1995) is a British female long-distance runner based in the United States. She competes in cross country running and track events. In March 2021, Markovc won European Athletics Indoor Championships 3000 m in a personal best time 8:46.43. She is married to Jernej Markovc who competed as a rower for the Slovenian National Team and University of Washington.
